mapper.select: SELECT b.`id`, b.`uid`, b.`title`, b.subtitle, b.author, b.publish_date, b.publisher, b.isbn, b.summary, b.pages, b.price, b.binding, b.cover, s.read_status, s.create_date FROM shelf_book AS s, book AS b WHERE s.book_id = b.id AND s.sys_status = 0 AND b.sys_status = 0 AND s.uid = #{uid} AND s.book_id = #{bookId} ORDER BY s.create_date DESC

FROM shelf_book WHERE `uid` = #{uid} AND book_id = #{bookId} AND `sys_status` = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE shelf_book SET sys_status = 1 WHERE `uid` = #{uid} AND `book_id` = #{bookId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM shelf_book WHERE `uid` = #{uid} AND `sys_status` = 0
mapper.insert: insert into shelf_book (`uid`, book_id, read_status, create_date, sys_status) values (#{uid}, #{bookId}, #{readStatus}, #{createDate}, #{sysStatus})
